item.title: 受欧洲央行降息押注影响，欧元将创五个月来最差走势
item.description: 由于交易商押注欧洲央行将采取越来越激进的降息措施，欧元有望创下 4 月以来最长连跌纪录。【原文：The euro is poised for its longest losing streak since April as traders bet on an increasingly aggressive path for interest-rate cuts by the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 社交影响者称不透明薪酬交易造成不公平差异
item.description: 社交媒体有影响力的人在薪酬方面基本上还是 "盲人摸象"。但首先...【原文：Social media influencers are still largely flying blind when it comes to pay. But first...】

item.title: 亚马逊将在假日季招聘25万人，与2023年持平
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）将为美国的假日购物高峰招聘约 25 万人，与去年持平，这表明该公司预计其最大市场的需求将保持稳定。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. will bring on about 250,000 people in the US for the holiday shopping rush, unchanged from last year and an indication that the company expects steady demand in its biggest market.】

item.title: 尼日利亚企业削减美元债务，奈拉汇率再创新低
item.description: 尼日利亚奈拉兑美元汇率创下新低，原因是人们预期尼日利亚货币将继续受挫，西非国家的企业寻求减少对美元的敞口。【原文：Nigeria’s naira struck a fresh low against the dollar as businesses in the West African nation sought to reduce their exposure to the US currency amid expectations the local unit will continue to suffer.】

item.title: 下任防务专员表示：欧盟必须有能力对抗俄罗斯
item.description: 欧盟有史以来首位防务专员提名人表示，欧盟必须加强军事能力，以应对可能在六年内与俄罗斯发生的对抗。【原文：The European Union’s nominee to be its first-ever defense commissioner said the bloc must scale up its military capabilities for a possible confrontation with Russia that could be as few as six years away.】

item.title: Amundi 看涨瑞士法郎，押注避险吸引力
item.description: Amundi SA 已转而看好瑞士法郎，押注该货币将受益于地缘政治纷争的加剧。【原文：Amundi SA has turned positive on the Swiss franc, betting that the currency will benefit from an uptick in geopolitical strife.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。油价持续上涨，日元和英镑下挫，OpenAI 融资 66 亿美元。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Oil prices keep rising, the yen and the pound sink and OpenAI raises $6.6 billion. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 印度股市因增长担忧和资金外流创八月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于担心经济放缓以及中国股市大涨导致全球基金卖盘回升，印度股市在假期结束后于周四下跌。【原文：Indian stocks tumbled on Thursday after returning from a holiday as concerns about a slowing economy and a pick-up in selling by global funds amid a surge in Chinese equities weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 关于欧盟新边境检查，旅行者需要了解什么？
item.description: 欧盟正在加紧实施新的边境管制系统计划，以处理每年数以亿计到访欧盟的人员，尽管有人怀疑该系统能否在下个月的启动日期前及时准备就绪。【原文：The European Union is pressing ahead with plans for a new border control system to handle the hundreds of millions of people who visit the bloc every year, although there are doubts that it will be ready in time for next month’s launch date.】

item.title: 美国投票临近，欧洲股权银行家急于完成交易
item.description: 股权资本市场的银行家们正赶在美国总统大选和财报封锁期带来预期的活动放缓之前，在欧洲敲定一系列新的交易。【原文：Equity capital market bankers are rushing to finalize a fresh slate of deals in Europe before the US presidential election and an earnings blackout period bring an anticipated slowdown in activity.】

item.title: 国际能源署称 2025 年世界天然气用量将在液化天然气争夺战中创纪录
item.description: 据国际能源机构称，随着亚洲和欧洲之间对海运燃料的竞争加剧，明年全球天然气需求量将创下历史新高。【原文：Global demand for natural gas will hit an all-time high next year as competition for seaborne fuel intensifies between Asia and Europe, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长称央行将讨论降息问题
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）今天在曼谷与泰国央行行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）会晤后表示，泰国央行将考虑降息。【原文：Thai Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira said the Bank of Thailand will consider cutting interest rates, following a meeting with Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput in Bangkok today.】

item.title: 政策提振，汇丰银行将在岸中国股票评级上调至增持
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）将中国大陆股票评级从 "中性 "上调至 "增持"，此前中国政府出台了一项政策，从风险回报的角度来看，该市场更具吸引力。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has upgraded mainland Chinese stocks to overweight from neutral, after authorities delivered a policy boost which renders the market more attractive from a risk-reward perspective.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长赞成在宽松周期中采取 "小步快跑 "策略
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，菲律宾央行可能会在明年年底前利用四分之一点的举措将基准利率下调约 175 个基点。【原文：The Philippine central bank will likely use quarter-point moves to slash its benchmark interest rate by around 175 basis points through the end of next year, according to Governor Eli Remolona.】

item.title: 巴克莱称欧洲股市创纪录涨势将失去回购推动力
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的策略师表示，随着企业在公布业绩前暂停回购，以及法国提议提高税收，欧洲股市创纪录反弹的一个主要推动力有可能消退。【原文：A key driver of Europe’s record-setting equity rally is at risk of fading as companies pause buybacks ahead of reporting results and as France proposes higher taxes, according to Barclays Plc strategists.】

item.title: 软银称瑞信应为基金 4.4 亿美元的格林希尔亏损负责
item.description: 软银集团（Softbank Group Corp）面临瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）提出的 4.4 亿美元诉讼，称该银行应为格林希尔资本公司（Greensill Capital）倒闭造成的部分投资者损失负责。【原文：Softbank Group Corp., facing a $440 million lawsuit from Credit Suisse, said the bank was to blame for some of the investor losses tied to the collapse of Greensill Capital.】

item.title: 中国经济到底有多糟糕？能否解决？
item.description: 中国领导人将今年的经济增长目标定在 5%左右，鉴于消费支出疲软、全球对中国商品的反弹以及房地产市场依然不稳，这个目标可谓雄心勃勃。今年 9 月，在目标遥不可及的情况下，中国政府推出了包括降息在内的一揽子刺激措施，以扭转局面。但成功的希望渺茫。持续的通货紧缩压力也引发了关于这个世界第二大经济体是否会走向衰退的讨论。【原文：China’s leaders are aiming for economic growth of around 5% this year, an ambitous goal given sluggish consumer spending, a global backlash against Chinese goods and a still shaky property market. In September, with the target sliding out of reach, Beijing unleashed a package of stimulus measures including interest rate cuts to turn things around. Success is not assured. Persistent deflationary pressures have also sparked a discussion about whether the world’s second-biggest economy is headed fo】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚债券持有人以不合理为由拒绝 18% 的减息提议
item.description: 持有埃塞俄比亚违约美元债券的投资者拒绝了政府就这一 10 亿美元债券提出的债务重组条款。【原文：Investors holding Ethiopia’s defaulted dollar bonds have rejected the debt restructuring terms proposed by the government for the $1 billion issue.】

item.title: 恒大清盘人在法庭对峙中零封前首席执行官
item.description: 中国恒大集团前首席执行官夏海钧再次成为舆论焦点，因为这家违约开发商的清算人正试图收回资金以偿还债权人。【原文：Xia Haijun, the former CEO of China Evergrande Group, has been thrust back into the limelight as liquidators of the defaulted developer try to claw back money to repay creditors.】

item.title: 肯尼亚先令波动减弱，央行抑制汇率走强
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行的干预措施正在抑制先令的波动，因为官员们正试图防止非洲表现最好的货币变得过于强势。【原文：Interventions by Kenya’s central bank are suppressing volatility in the shilling as officials try to keep the best-performing currency in Africa from getting too strong.】

item.title: 外资流入菲律宾股市势头减弱
item.description: 过去一周，随着菲律宾基准股票指数下跌和菲律宾比索走软，外资购买菲律宾股票的速度放缓。【原文：Foreign buying of Philippines’ stocks slowed in the past week as the nation’s benchmark equity index fell and the Philippine peso weakened.】

item.title: 大篷车交易失败引发 ICG 对估值虚高的诉讼
item.description: 英国投资管理公司 Intermediate Capital Group Plc 正在起诉一家房地产服务公司，称该公司夸大了房地产估值，并据此贷出了数亿英镑。【原文：UK investment manager Intermediate Capital Group Plc is suing a real estate services firm over property valuations it says were inflated and against which it lent hundreds of millions of pounds.】

item.title: 银行将从 2025 年起使用 Swift 进行代币交易
item.description: 从明年开始，商业银行和中央银行将可以在 Swift 信息网络上进行数字资产交易的现场试验，这将推动区块链技术的广泛机构应用更加接近现实。【原文：Commercial and central banks will be able to conduct live trials of digital-asset transactions on the Swift messaging network starting next year, nudging widespread institutional adoption of blockchain technology closer to reality.】

item.title: 印度庞大的期权市场为何危及金融稳定？
item.description: 印度从股票衍生品市场的小角色跃升为全球最大的市场，而这一切都发生在短短五年之内。新的需求大多来自缺乏经验、喜欢冒险的散户投资者。【原文：India has gone from being a small player in the equity derivatives market to the world’s largest, all within just five years. Most of the new demand is coming from inexperienced retail investors with an appetite for risk.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚因批评性内容而禁止国家媒体的在线部门
item.description: 坦桑尼亚最大的媒体公司数字部门发布了一篇关于绑架批评国家领导人的人的动画片，之后该公司暂停了数字部门的业务。【原文：Tanzania has suspended the digital division of the nation’s biggest media house, after it released an animated piece about abductions of people critical of the nation’s leaders.】

item.title: 以下是伊朗最关键的石油和天然气基础设施地图
item.description: 以色列誓言对伊朗遭受的大规模导弹袭击进行报复，这使波斯湾的石油供应成为关注焦点，也使市场处于紧张状态。【原文：Israel’s vow to retaliate against Iran for a massive missile attack on the country is bringing a focus on oil supplies from the Persian Gulf, and keeping markets on edge.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀降至三年低点，支持瑞士央行进一步减息
item.description: 瑞士通胀率降至三年多来最慢，表明该国央行将进一步放宽货币政策。【原文：Swiss inflation weakened to the slowest pace in more than three years, pointing to further monetary easing by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 法国预算部长称将对最富有的 0.3% 征收临时税
item.description: 法国预算部长洛朗-圣马丁（Laurent Saint-Martin）表示，为帮助控制国家失控的公共财政而征收的临时税只对最富有的家庭和最大的公司产生影响。【原文：French Budget Minister Laurent Saint-Martin said temporary taxes to help rein in the country’s runaway public finances would hit only the very richest households and largest companies.】
